name: Drive Crazy Ver.0.0.3
description:
It is a game to drive the city in a light truck! Please run away because someone is after you.

-----------------------------------------------------------

■Recommended specs
-----------------------------------------------------------
OS：Windows10
CPU：i7-4790 CPU @3.60GHz
Memory：Memory16G
GPU：NVIDIA GeForce GTX1060 6GB

-----------------------------------------------------------
■How to start
-----------------------------------------------------------
Double-click DriveCrazy.exe to open it

-----------------------------------------------------------
■How to do control
-----------------------------------------------------------
●Keyboard
Pause：Escape key

●Gamepad（XBOX controller）
Pause：Menu button

※The keyboard is very difficult to use, so I recommend the gamepad.
